statements: UPDATE OmicsDataSets SET dataset_name = 'Updated Name', last_updated = NOW() WHERE dataset_id = 1;
UPDATE OmicsDataSets SET dataset_description = 'New Description', creation_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE dataset_id = 2;
UPDATE OmicsDataSets SET dataset_name='Updated Name', dataset_description='Updated Description' WHERE dataset_id=1;
UPDATE OmicsDataSets SET dataset_description='New Description', last_updated=NOW(), dataset_name='New Name' WHERE dataset_id=3;
UPDATE omics_data_sets SET data_set_description = 'Updated description' WHERE data_set_id = 1;
UPDATE omics_data_analysis SET analysis_results = '{"quality": "high"}' WHERE analysis_id = 10;
UPDATE omics_data_sets SET data_set_description = 'Updated description' WHERE data_set_id = 1;
UPDATE omics_data_analysis SET analysis_results = '{"average": 25.5, "max": 50}' WHERE analysis_id = 2;
UPDATE omics_datasets SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE dataset_metadata SET metadata_value = 'New value' WHERE dataset_id = 2 AND category_id = 1;
UPDATE omics_datasets SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE dataset_metadata SET category_id = 3, metadata_value = 'New metadata value' WHERE dataset_id = 5;
UPDATE omics_data SET data_description = 'New data description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE analysis_results SET analysis_summary = 'Updated analysis summary', analysis_method = 'Statistical Analysis' WHERE data_set_id = 3;
UPDATE omics_data SET data_description = 'Updated data description', data_size = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE analysis_results SET analysis_summary = 'New analysis summary', analysis_method = 'Statistical Analysis' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE omics_metadata SET author = 'John Doe' WHERE study_id = 1;
UPDATE sample_metadata SET sample_type = 'RNA' WHERE sample_id = 5;
UPDATE omics_metadata SET author='Jane Doe', publication_date='2022-09-15' WHERE study_id=1;
UPDATE sample_metadata SET sample_type='Control' WHERE sample_id=5;
